name: Illustrations Block – 300+ Customizable SVG Images
author: acosmin

sections.description:
Illustrations Block enables you to add awesome SVG illustrations which you can customize directly from the new Editor (Gutenberg). You can change colors, alignment, sizes for different viewports.

Assets

React SVG components
https://github.com/GraemeFulton/react-undraw-illustrations
License: MIT
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’.
  2. Search for Illustrations.
  3. Activate Illustrations from your Plugins page.
  4. Go to “after activation” below.

Manually

  1. Upload the illustartions folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Illustrations plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

After activation

  1. Edit or add a new post/page.
  2. Add the Illustrations block in your content. You can find it under Common Blocks or by searching for illustartions.
  3. You’re done.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

Release Date: January 7th, 2019

  • Increased required wp version to 5.3.2;
  • Fixed issue with double position:absolute in markup;

1.0.1

Release Date: January 7th, 2019

  • Increased required wp version to 5.2.0;
  • Updated dependencies;
  • Updated plugin tags;
  • Fixed modal style for sticky header;
  • Fixed svg bottom padding when the plugin is disabled, you might need to save the posts again;
  • Fixed missing textdomains;
  • Fixed missing $css variable define for filter;

1.0.0

Release Date: December 17th, 2018

  • Plugin release;
